name: URW Geometric (iOS10-12)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Variable .ttfs are reworked from ground up. Downward compatible with iOS10&11. You can refer to the screenshot for reference as to the appearance/effect.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Apply with Anemone. Package name = Fonts.

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
